level.heading: Applicability to volunteer health practitioners.
level.text: This chapter applies to volunteer health practitioners registered with a registration system that complies with ยง 7-2361.04 and who provide health or veterinary services in the District for a host entity while an emergency declaration is in effect.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-184
level.text: For Law 18-184, see notes following ยง 7-2361.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 3 of the Uniform Emergency Volunteer Health Practitioners Act.
